com.ibm.opencard.terminal.pcsc10
Class Pcsc10CardTerminal

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--opencard.core.terminal.CardTerminal
        |
        +--com.ibm.opencard.terminal.pcsc10.Pcsc10CardTerminal
public class Pcsc10CardTerminal
extends opencard.core.terminal.CardTerminal
implements opencard.opt.terminal.TerminalCommand, opencard.core.terminal.Pollable, opencard.opt.terminal.PowerManagementInterface

Implementation of an OpenCard CardTerminal for PCSC.

                             java.lang.String address,
                             Pcsc10CardTerminalFactory factory,
                             int port)
                      throws opencard.core.terminal.CardTerminalException
Instantiate an Pcsc10Terminal.
Parameters:
name - The user friendly name.
type - The terminal type (here "PCSC")
address - The communication port
factory - The card terminal reference
port - The communication port ID
Throws:
opencard.core.terminal.CardTerminalException - Thrown when a problem occured.

close

public void close()
           throws opencard.core.terminal.CardTerminalException
Close the connection to the card terminal by powerDown the Card. Could be used by unregister to free up the resources used by the terminal.
Throws:
opencard.core.terminal.CardTerminalException - Thrown if there are problems with closing the connection

                      throws opencard.core.terminal.CardTerminalException
Check whether there is a smart card present.
Parameters:
slot - Number of the slot to check (must be 0 for PCSC)
Returns:

getCardID

public opencard.core.terminal.CardID getCardID(int slot)
                                        throws opencard.core.terminal.CardTerminalException
Return the CardID of the presently inserted card. Will returned the cached card if slot's status has not changed; otherwise it will really retrieve the CardID.

Parameters:
slot - slot number
Returns:
A CardID object representing the inserted smart card.
Throws:
opencard.core.terminal.CardTerminalException - thrown when problem occured getting the ATR of the card
Overrides:
getCardID in class opencard.core.terminal.CardTerminal
